name: Hulu Plus
description: Account or subscription may be required from provider. Hulu Plus offers unlimited instant streaming of current and library TV shows and hit movies for $7.99/month. Watch current season episodes of hit shows like Brooklyn Nine-Nine, How To Get Away with Murder, Sleepy Hollow, South Park and many more. Enjoy current and previous seasons of Reality shows such as Top Chef and Keeping Up with the Kardashians; Kids programs including SpongeBob Squarepants and Caillou; Latino series and top telenovelas; Hulu Original series and much more. $7.99 / month. Cancel anytime.
